name: SigzaLock Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .SGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: As of early 2014, the SGZ file extension changed to .SAFE. SigzaLock is now discontinued.

description: File created by SigzaLock encryption software; stores an encrypted version of a file, such as a Word (.DOCX) or PowerPoint (.PPTX) document, and can only be decrypted by SigzaLock software; used for securely storing or transferring files.
